H0.text: Mass suicide is said to have ended the defence by the zealots of which fortress. Jotapata

H1.text: Mass suicide is said to have ended the defence by the zealots of which fortress. Gamla

H2.text: Mass suicide is said to have ended the defence by the zealots of which fortress. Herodium

H3.text: Mass suicide is said to have ended the defence by the zealots of which fortress. Masada

A4.text: According to Josephus, when Roman troops entered the fortress, they discovered that its defenders had set all the buildings but the food storerooms ablaze and committed mass suicide or killed each other, 960 men, women, and children in total.
